descriptions: Fixed a bug in the Emote Creator where missing bone variables in 'attachto' imports would cause the attachment to fail instead of defaulting to bone -1.
Added Config.DisablePropCollision to allow server owners to toggle physics/collision for props used in animations.
Integrated the Pazeee_FireworkEmotePack with pre-configured PTFX settings to resolve common behavior and visual issues.
Enhanced internal attachment logic to provide better stability for custom animation imports.
